columns.name: _forBookingOptionRequest
columns.description: Reference to the BookingOptionRequest the information of the LogisticsObject is detailling

columns.name: _forBookingRequest
columns.description: Reference to the Booking Request the of the Booking Option

columns.name: _price
columns.description: Price of the Booking (if different from the offer)

columns.name: _bookingTimes
columns.description: Information about the Booking Times of a privded Booking Option

columns.name: _carrierProduct
columns.description: Reference to the Carrier product if known

columns.name: _unitsPreference
columns.description: Reference to unit preferences of the request (e.g. kg or cm)

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _stationRemarks
columns.description: Remarks related to specific stations in the routing (e.g. Embargo in XXX)

columns.name: _transportLegs
columns.description: Reference to the Transport Legs of the proposed routing

columns.name: _additionalInformation
columns.description: Additional infromation related to the Booking Option; e.g. sales details

columns.name: _offerValidFrom
columns.description: Date and time of beginning of offer validity

columns.name: _offerValidTo
columns.description: Date and time of end of offer validity

columns.name: _requestMatch
columns.description: Indicates if the Booking Option is a match to the Booking Option Request preferences

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: _alternatives
columns.description: Description of the alternatives proposed that do not match the Booking Option Request
